setting.menuDescription: System Settings are based on cache changes, and part of the Settings need to be implemented through code modification
setting.layout: Layout, including six out-of-the-box  system layout
setting.layoutTopLean: Top (lean) mode, suitable for small projects
setting.layoutAside: Sidebar mode, Logo and menu on the left
setting.layoutAsideDark: Dark Sidebar mode, Logo and menu on the left
setting.layoutAsideLean: Sidebar (thin) mode provides a floating bar
setting.layoutAsideLeanDark: Dark sidebar (thin) mode provides a floating bar
setting.colorScheme: Color scheme, you can switch different color style
setting.themeColor: Theme color, which can also be adjusted with a custom theme color to fit your project
setting.toolbar: bar, click the card to close the unwanted  button
setting.component: Component Settings, you can flexibly configure the component style and location in the layout
setting.otherDescription: These configurations are critical to the system and can only be modified by code
setting.updateSuccess: The system Settings are modified successfully
setting.copySuccess: Copy succeeded, please paste it into the src/constant/settings/settings.replace.ts file!
setting.backSuccess: System Settings have been restored to default Settings

profile.menuDescription: You can update your personal information on this page

notification.menuDescription: View the personal message and notification list
